api_list.name: Transliterate (Any to Latin)
api_list.description: Transliteration endpoint provides you with transliteration of text from any language to Latin. Transliterate "こんにちは" to "kon'nichiha" with ease.

api_list.description: This endpoint provides autocomplete (word completion) for 80+ languages.
